snippet: The crown prince has asked that King Bhumibol’s cremation be held after a one-year period of mourning, with his own coronation to come later, an official said....
lead_paragraph: The crown prince has asked that King Bhumibol’s cremation be held after a one-year period of mourning, with his own coronation to come later, an official said.

headline.main: Thailand Says Bhumibol’s Cremation Is a Year Away, With Heir’s Coronation to Follow
headline.print_headline: Year May Pass Before Thais Have New King
